p: Similarly, lavender and melissa wastes were proved to be rich in polyphenols (especially rosmarinic acid) and exhibited high antimicrobial activity [ 63]. The processing of jackfruit ( Artocarpus heterophyllus Lam) yields large amounts of bio-wastes. The ethyl acetate extracts obtained from the peel, fiber, and core of the jackfruit showed antibacterial activity against Xanthomonas axonopodis pv. manihotis [ 64].
